SENT.plain: Ulcerative colitis (UC) patients have an increased risk of colorectal cancer
UC has two general patterns of dysplasia, which are commonly classified as adenoma-like dysplasia-associated lesion or mass (DALM) and non-adenoma-like DALM
The latter has a high risk of concurrent malignancy and often requires a colectomy
Unfortunately, non-adenoma-like DALMs sometimes have endoscopic features similar to those of adenoma-like DALMs
Therefore, new endoscopic techniques to distinguish between these two kinds of DALM have been proposed
